meaning: Patience is the key to relief.

text: إذا تفرقت الغنم قادتها العنز الجرباء
meaning: When the sheep scatter, even the sick goat can lead them.

text: درهم وقاية خير من قنطار علاج
meaning: An ounce of prevention is better than a pound of cure.

text: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
meaning: True friends reveal themselves during hard times.

text: Don’t put all your eggs in one basket.
meaning: Don’t risk everything on a single opportunity.
What you do matters more than what you say.

text: The early bird catches the worm.
meaning: Those who act quickly have the advantage.
Choose your neighbor before your house.
Beware of the harm from one you’ve helped.

text: When in Rome, do as the Romans do.
meaning: Adapt to the customs of the place you're in.

text: ما طار طير وارتفع إلا كما طار وقع
meaning: No bird flies high but eventually falls.
Telling the truth is always the right thing.
